name: Don't Die (itch) (MVBred)
description:
The only goal in this game is to not die. You are a person and you have to avoid death so you can find a bush in the game that with send you off to the next area where you have to do it all over again. So what you have to do: Don't die, and find the bush on every level, easy.

(This Game was Made for the Atari 2600 Jam)

Controls:

Keyboard: Arrow Keys to Move, Escape to Quit

Gamepad: Left Stick to Move, Select Button to Quit
